document_data.name: Benauril
document_data.mainbody: '''Benauril''' was an outcast [[wizard]] from [[Halruaa]] who was active ''circa'' the mid-to-late 12{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was notable for creating the creatures known as [[dark tree]]s.
document_data.Activities: Benauril's research involved [[necromancy]] and a variety of other, similarly distasteful forms of [[magic]].
document_data.History: From within the [[Aerilpar Forest]], Benauril spent a great deal of time trying to create his own breed of [[treant]]-like servants that would heed his will. He invested a great deal of time into his work, and was initially quite pleased with his progress until a failed experiment produced the first dark trees, which rebelled and killed him.
